explanation: [0-0] On a road paved with red square tiles, a young woman in black clothes is holding a cell phone in her left hand and looking at it, with a lollipop in her right hand near her mouth. A young man in a black suit raises his left hand and smiles towards the right. On the left side of the screen, there is a list of emojis, from top to bottom: an open hand, a fist, a hand with the index finger pointing up, a peace sign, and a heart gesture. On the left side, there are tall black buildings and buildings with red walls. On the right side, there is green vegetation and tall buildings in the distance.

[0-2] Then, the man walks to the right, first reaching out and shaking his hands in front of him. Immediately afterward, he turns to the left, takes the lollipop from the woman's hand and puts it in his mouth. The woman looks at the man in surprise with her right hand raised.

[0-2] Then, the man walks to the right, first reaching out and shaking his hands in front of him. Immediately afterward, he turns to the left, takes the lollipop from the woman's hand and puts it in his mouth. The woman looks at the man in surprise with her right hand raised.

[2-5] Next, the man opens his hand toward the front, and the open hand emoji lights up green. Then, the man makes a fist gesture toward the front, and the fist emoji lights up green. After that, the man raises his index finger toward the front, and the index finger emoji lights up green. Then the man extends his index and middle fingers toward the front, and the peace sign emoji lights up green. Finally, the man looks at the woman on the right, making a half-heart gesture with his hand, and the woman smiles happily.
